short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show only videos from whitelisted YouTube channels.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Would you like to see only some specific content in your YouTube searches or recommendations? With this extension you can just type the name of the channel you would like to appear and everything else will be filtered out.

Important! You can always activate or deactivate the filter by turning on/off the toggle switch icon.

Help me improving this project here: https://github.com/FedericoGentile/youtube-channels-whitelist
